author: yeepeekoo
title: NFT Picture Profile AI generator
description: In web3, users interact via avatars and picture profiles (PP). But how can one create multiple PP-NFTs based on mood, situations, stories?
solution: An AI text-to-image generator to automatically generate NFTs from a real profile picture morphed via keywords (sad, punk, zombie, etc...)
experience: 20+ years in software dev, M. Sc in AI (neural Nets), played with AI algos and NFT automatic generation for past 3 months on SOL/ETH.
